ConfirmTnC_NewDesign: <value><span id="TcContent" data-content="I am at least {LegalAge} years old or the legal minimum age in my country of residence (whichever is higher) and I have read, understood and accepted the "></span><strong><a id="TCLink" href="#" data-link="{Scheme}/zh-cn/legal/terms-and-conditions/{AccountType}" target="_blank" class = "link font-weight-bold cont-form-fi-tnc" >Sports Terms and Conditions</a></strong>, <strong><a id="RcTCLink" href="#" data-link="{Scheme}_/web/public/rc-tc.aspx?lang=zh-cn&status=_{RcAccountType}_&action=signin" target="_blank" class = "link font-weight-bold cont-form-fi-tnc" >Casino Terms and Conditions</a></strong>, <strong><a id="BetLink" href="https://info_{DomainUrl}_/zh-cn/article/AA-00239" class = "link font-weight-bold cont-form-fi-tnc" target="Info">Betting Rules and Regulations</a></strong>, <strong><a id="PPLink" href="#" data-link="_{Scheme}_/zh-tw/legal/privacy-policy-_{AccountType}_" target="_blank" class = "link font-weight-bold cont-form-fi-tnc" id="redirectPP" >Privacy Policy</a></strong> and the <strong><a id="PromotionLink" href="https://info_{DomainUrl}/zh-cn/article/AA-00403" class = "link font-weight-bold cont-form-fi-tnc" target="Info">Promotion Terms and Conditions</a></strong>.</value>
ContactLiveChatIfExpectedCurrencyNotAvai: Changing of currency is not allowed once registration is submitted. Contact Live Chat if you cannot find your preferred currency.
ContactSboSupport: You may contact us on live chat by quoting the error code for further assistance.
DateOfBirthYearInvalid: Enter a valid year. You must be at least 18 years old or the legal minimum age in your country of residence.
DateOfBirthYearInvalid_MNL: Enter a valid year. You must be at least 21 years old or the legal minimum age in your country of residence.
EmailRule: 這個郵箱將被用於核對您的身份，付款註冊，提款以及聯繫您。
LoginNameNotAvailable: This login name is not available, choose another login name.
LoginNameStartWithAlphabet: Login name must start with an uppercase or lowercase letter (a-z). Letters are not case-sensitive.
MobileLength: Enter a valid mobile number that contains 5 or more digits.
MobileRule: Enter a valid mobile number that contains 5 or more digits. This mobile number will be used to verify your identity, for payment registration and contact purposes.
NameRule: Enter your name as listed on your debit card, credit card or bank account. Your name will be used to verify your identity during withdrawal.
NoLastNameNote: 我銀行戶口的姓名沒有姓氏
PasswordShouldNotContainLoginName: Password cannot contain your login name.
PasswordShouldNotContainNames: Password cannot contain your first or last name.
PromotionEmailConfirm: I'm interested in special promotions from {brandName}.
ReEnterEmailRule: Email does not match, re-enter email.
ReEnterPasswordRule: Password does not match, re-enter password.
ResidentCountryCodeMustBeSelected: Select the country you currently reside in.
SecurityQuestionAnswerRule: Enter the answer to your security question.
